en: - Kak, macam mana dengan kawan saya? - Sebentar. Saya tak pasti lagi.
vi:
SULTANAH HAJJAH KALSOM HOSPITAL
 -Nurse, how's my friend? -I'm not sure just yet. Okay?

en: Bertenang, Aizat. Ini cuma ubat tahan sakit.
vi: Relax, Jat. This is just a painkiller.

en: Sakit sekejap saja. Kau nak kaki kau sakit sampai bila?
vi: It'll only hurt for a second, or else, your foot will hurt forever.
No, don't do it! It hurts!
I didn't mean it, I swear!

en: Mari tolong aku pegang budak manja ini.
vi: Come help me with that wimp.

en: Aizat kuat. Insya-Allah, dia takkan apa-apa.
vi: Aizat is tough. He'll be fine.

en: Ubat tahan sakit dah masuk. Kamu rehat dulu, ya?

vi: Try to rest to help reduce the swelling.

en: Aizat, janganlah meronta-ronta. Tangan aku belum pulih lagi.
vi: Jat, don't thrash around like that. My hand hasn't healed yet.

en: Mari jumpa warden untuk ambil ubatnya dan sebagainya.
vi: Let's go and see the warden to get his medicine and stuff.

en: Macam mana dengan kaki kau? Kau tak apa-apa?
vi: How's your foot? Are you okay?
What did the doctor say? Is it broken?

en: Bahaya kalau kau berdiri di belebas.
vi: It was dangerous for you to sit on the ledge.

en: Selama ini, aku duduk di situ dan tiada apa berlaku pada aku.
vi: I've been sitting there for years and nothing ever happened to me.

en: Sebab tiada perempuan gila baling batu pada aku macam kau.
vi: Because there were no crazy girls throwing rocks at me like you did.

en: Sekarang doktor kata aku mungkin tak boleh main ragbi lagi.
vi: Now the doctor said that I might not be able to play rugby again.
Do you want to be responsible for that?

en: Aku sakit, aku tiada masa nak main-main dengan kau.
vi: I'm in pain, I don't have time to joke around with you.
Wait, I'll get that for you.

en: - Aku boleh buka. - Biar aku tolong.
vi: -I can handle this. -Let me help you.

en: - Tak perlu. - Kau sakit, biar aku tolong.
vi: -You don't have to. -You're in pain, let me help.
-Okay, you do that. -Give it to me.

en: - Tak perlu mengada-ada. - Aku boleh tolong kau!
Kami pergi sekejap saja, kamu berdua dah basah?
vi: We were gone for a minute and you got all chummy together?

en: Macam mana dia boleh jatuh begitu?
vi: -How did he fall like that? -I know, right?
Tai Ying, hopefully, he didn't break his foot.

en: Kalau dia tak boleh main ragbi,

vi: he can't become a national player.
Thank you, I'll return these later.

en: Lebih baik kau rancang untuk berus gigi.
vi: You'd better plan to brush your teeth.

en: Henry, he likes Barry but cannot offer flowers.

vi: Daa, SPM is around the corner.
Your seat is far away from me.

en: Rancangan ini dinamakan Projek Anchor SPM.
vi: This plan is called Project Anchor SPM.

en: Kau makan ubat tahan sakit atau kau khayal?
vi: Are you on painkillers or are you high?
This is just like a game of rugby.

en: Kita kena ada ayam tambatan dan kita cuma boleh hantar ke belakang.
vi: We need to have an anchor and we can only pass to the back.

en: Lebih cepat bola dihantar kepada pemain sayap, lebih cepat kita menang.
vi: The faster we pass the ball to the winger, the faster we'll win.

en: Untuk menang, kita kena ada apa?
vi: To win the game, what do we need?

en: Kita perlukan ayam tambatan dan pasukan.
vi: We need an anchor and we need a team.
It's just the same with the game of SPM.

en: Tapi sekarang, kita kena cari pasukan kita sendiri.
vi: But now, we have to find our own team.

en: Kepala atau kaki kau yang terhentak dulu?
vi: Did you fall on your head or on your feet?

en: Sebab jururawat buat imbasan sinar-X pada kaki kau semalam.
vi: Because the nurse only X-rayed your foot yesterday.

en: Harapan akan serahkan jawapan ke belakang.
vi: the Anchor will pass the answers to the back.

en: jawapan daripada Harapan kepada seluruh pasukan.
vi: has to pass the answers from the Anchor to the whole team.

en: kita perlukan budak yang bijak untuk jadi Harapan.
vi: we need a smart kid for the Anchor.

en: Jadi kau nak aku beri jawapan kepada kau?
vi: So you want me to pass my answers to you?

en: Kau dah gilakah? Macam mana kalau kita tertangkap?
vi: Are you crazy? What if we get caught?

en: Okey, aku ada hak untuk tuntut ini daripada dia.
vi: Okay, I deserve to claim this from her.

en: Bukannya dia tak pernah buat begini.
vi: It's not like she hasn't done this before.

en: Kau rasa macam mana Jaja boleh jadi tiga teratas dalam tingkatan kita?
vi: How do you think Jaja gets to be the Top 3 in our batch?

en: Aaidaa gadis paling suci, baik dan manis di sekolah ini.
vi: Aaidaa is the purest, kindest, and sweetest in this school.

en: Aku tak nak kau cemarkan nama dia.
vi: I don't want you to tarnish her reputation.
Do you have a crush on Aaidaa?

en: Aku seorang saja yang tak nampak apa yang bagus tentang Aaidaa?
vi: Is it just me who can't see what's so good about Aaidaa?
Why? I'm in the Top 2, aren't I?

en: Ya, kau di tempat kedua teratas,
Kau tak begitu mahir dalam Bahasa Melayu dan Sejarah.
vi: You don't do very well in Malay and history.

en: Sebab itulah aku tak nak kau rosakkan dia.
vi: Because she's perfect, I don't want you to ruin her.

en: Sebab itulah dia takkan setuju dengan idea kau.
vi: And because she's perfect, she won't agree with your idea.

en: yang buat kaki aku jadi begini,
Botol, beritahu aku yang aku betul dan dia salah.
vi: Botol, tell me that I'm right and he's wrong.
Jat, right now my pH is neutral.

en: Jadi tiada siapa yang betul atau salah.
- Jaja, boleh tolong aku? - Tolong apa?
vi: -Jaja, can you help me? -What is it?

en: Mari letak reben untuk buat ia nampak lawa.
vi: Let's put a ribbon to make it cute.
Here's a get-well fund for you.

en: - Dia dah buat macam-macam pada aku. - Aduhai.
vi: But she has done various things to me.

en: Bukan salah dia. Dia tak sengaja.
vi: It's not her fault. She didn't mean it.

en: Kalau dia betul-betul nak minta maaf dengan aku…
vi: If she really wants to apologize to me,

en: …aku nak dia sendiri bawa ini kepada aku.
vi: I want her to come here and give this to me herself.
AIZAT WANTS YOU TO SEND THIS YOURSELF
-Peace be upon you. -Peace be upon you.

en: Aaidaa, Aizat ada minta kau buat apa-apa?
vi: Aaidaa, did Aizat ask you to do anything?
do you know who was behind it?

en: Jawatan kamu sebagai ketua pelajar diberikan oleh pihak pentadbiran.
vi: Your position as the head prefect is given by the administration.

en: Jadi kamu bertugas untuk pihak pentadbiran.
vi: So you work for the administration.

en: takkan tipu saya untuk melindungi pelajar lain.
vi: will not lie to me to protect other students.

en: Makanan tambahan dan ubat tahan sakit.
- Kenapa kau beri kepada aku? - Sebab kau cedera.
vi: -Why would you give that to me? -Because you're hurt.

en: Yalah. Aku baling batu pada kau dan kau jatuh dari tingkat satu.
vi: I threw a rock at you and you fell from the ledge.

en: Maaf, aku tak tahu nak buat apa lagi!
vi: Sorry, I don't know what else I should do!
The doctor said that there was a torn ligament.

en: Aku mungkin tak boleh main ragbi lagi selepas ini.
vi: I might not be able to play rugby anymore.

en: Kau tahu aku tak pandai macam kau.
vi: You know I'm not smart like you.

en: kalau aku gagal SPM, aku ada jalan lain.
vi: that I would have something else if I failed my SPM.

en: Aku boleh cuba jadi pemain ragbi kebangsaan.
vi: I could try out to become a national rugby player.

en: Aku tak tahu nak buat apa.
vi: I don't know what to do.
Just tell me what you need.

en: Kau nak aku ajar kau? Belajar dengan kau?
vi: Do you want me to tutor you? Study with you?
It's too late for all that.
Just tell me. I'll try to do it.
You want to help me, right?

en: Kau kena beri jawapan masa SPM
vi: You have to give me the answers during SPM

en: macam kau tolong Jaja masa peperiksaan percubaan.
vi: just like you helped Jaja during the trial exams.
And here I am, feeling sorry for you.
I didn't plan to fall from the ledge.

en: - Aku kata aku minta maaf! - Itu tak cukup.
Kau dah hancurkan masa depan aku.

vi: You have to build it back up.

en: Kalau kita tertangkap, keputusan aku yang terbatal!
vi: If we get caught, my results will be void!

en: Ini risiko yang kau perlu ambil selepas apa yang kau buat pada aku.
vi: This is the risk you have to take after what you did to me.

en: Tapi kau yang mulakan! Kau conteng gambar aku!
vi: But you started it! You scribbled on my photo!
You're telling me, I started it?

en: Kau terlupa perlawanan ragbi menentang SSG?
vi: Have you forgotten the rugby match against SSG?

en: Ini salah dan gila! Kau dah gila, Aizat!
vi: This is wrong and crazy! You're crazy, Aizat!

en: Kau yang buat aku jadi begini.

vi: I didn't even ask for it!

en: Dia tak fikir apa akan berlaku kalau tertangkap?
vi: Doesn't he care what would happen if we get caught?

en: Aku nak cakap apa pada ayah?
vi: What will I say to Dad?
Why are you talking to yourself?

en: Lagu itu belum siap. Cuma ada lirik.
vi: The song is not finished. I only wrote some lyrics.

en: Semasa menulis lirik, aku di atas pagar.
vi: While writing the lyrics, I was on the fence.

en: Aku nak tahu sama ada ia betul atau salah.
vi: I want to know if it's right or wrong.

en: Jadi aku tulis lirik ini untuk dapatkan jawapan.
vi: I write these lyrics to get a clearer answer.

en: - Tapi kalau kita betul-betul nak buat,
vi: But if we're really doing this,
you have to do it my way.

en: Dia setuju dengan Projek Anchor SPM kita.
vi: She agreed with our Project Anchor SPM.

en: Dia beritahu kau yang dia setuju?
vi: Did she tell you she agreed to do it?

en: Kalau kau tak percaya, tanyalah dia.
vi: If you don't believe me, go and ask her.

en: - Okey, jadi ini diteruskan? - Ya! Ini diteruskan.
vi: -Okay, so this is on? -It's on! It's really on.

en: - Kalau begitu, aku turut serta. - Bagus.
Aku dah dapat carta tempat duduk untuk tingkatan kita.
vi: Now I've got the seating chart for our batch.

en: Jadi aku tahu aku nak tambah siapa dalam projek kita.
vi: So I know who to add to our project.
Hey, are you listening to me?

en: Kau tak rasa pelikkah? Orang pandang kita.
vi: Don't you feel weird? People are staring at us.

en: Kita bersembang di sini macam kita kawan?
vi: You and me talking right here like we're friends?

en: Hei, aku berkawan dengan semua orang.
Kau tak lepak dengan sesiapa selain Jaja.
vi: You don't hang out with anyone other than Jaja.

en: - Kau tiada kawan? - Bukan itu masalahnya.
vi: -Don't you have friends? -That's not the point.

en: Maksud aku, kalau kita nak buat begini,
vi: The point is if we're going to do this,
don't be too obvious about it.
The whole batch might find out.

en: Tapi kau faham maksud aku tadi?
vi: But do you understand what I said?
Do what you need to do.
So that's the plan. You got it?

en: Tapi aku tak nak kau beritahu sesiapa tentang projek ini.
vi: But don't tell anyone about this project.

I promise.
 -Promise for real. -I really promise!

en: Kalau ada orang tanya, kau kena cakap kau tak tahu apa-apa.
vi: If anybody asks you, you have to say you don't know anything.

en: Aku tak tahu. Apa maksud kau?
vi: I don't know. What do you mean?
Come here! I'll tell you everything.

en: Hei, nanti dulu. Berapa ramai yang tahu tentang ini sekarang?
vi: Hey, hold up. How many of us know about this now?

en: Dua, empat, enam, lapan, sembilan, sepuluh.
Jadi ada sepuluh orang termasuk kau dan Aaidaa.
vi: So there are 10 of us including you and Aaidaa.
You'd still plan to help me.

en: Kau cakap Zaim dan Tai Ying saja.
vi: You said it'd only be Zaim and Tai Ying.

en: Macam mana boleh ada sepuluh orang termasuk Jaja?
vi: How did it get to be ten people, even involving Jaja?

en: Sekejap, kau tak nak tolong Jaja sekali?
vi: Wait, you don't want to help Jaja?

en: Aku jemput mereka supaya jawapan kau boleh sampai kepada Jaja.
vi: I invited them so that your answers can reach Jaja.

en: Atau kau memang tak nak tolong Jaja?
vi: Or you really don't want to help Jaja?

en: Dengar sini, aku tak nak kau buat sesuka hati selepas ini.
vi: Listen here, I don't want you to do as you please after this.

en: Tak tahulah jika ia boleh digunakan.
vi: I don't know if it will work.

en: Malam ini, kita akan uji teori kau.
Jumpa aku di dewan pada jam 10:00 malam.
vi: Meet me in the hall at 10 p.m.

en: Itu lagu apa? Macam pernah dengar.
vi: What song is that? It sounds familiar.

en: Kenapa tak beritahu aku? Kau sama macam Botol.
vi: Why didn't you tell me? You're just like Botol.
It's just I couldn't believe it.

en: Semua orang dalam tingkatan kita anggap kau genius.
vi: Everybody in our batch sees you as a genius.

en: Orang melihat aku dengan cara yang mereka mahu.
vi: People see me the way they want to.

en: Orang hanya melihat kita dengan cara yang mereka mahu.
vi: People only see us the way they want to.

en: Tapi jangan beri mereka kuasa untuk buat begitu.
vi: But don't just give them the power to do that.
We have the power too, right?

en: Kuasa untuk tunjukkan apa yang mereka boleh lihat.
vi: The power to show people what they can see.
Come on. Let's do the test.

en: kita tak boleh guna isyarat yang kau guna sebelum ini.
vi: We can't use the sign language you used before.
the invigilator might understand it too.

en: Itu untuk beri jawapan kepada orang di kanan.
vi: That's if you want to pass the answers to people on your right.

en: Kalau kau nak hantar ke kiri, guna tangan dan kaki kiri.
vi: If you're passing to the left, use your left hand and foot.

en: Jelas sekali kau beri jawapan kepada orang.
vi: It was obvious you were giving people answers.

en: Kau kena bertenang, okey? Buat macam biasa.

vi: You got it wrong in the middle.
But you got it right again in the end.

en: Sebab aku tak boleh fokus tengok kau macam robot tadi.
vi: I couldn't focus, looking at you being all robot-like.

en: Apabila aku fokus semula, aku tiru semuanya.
vi: When I picked it back up, I copied everything.

en: Apabila dah habis, aku tiru dari bawah.
vi: Once it was done, I copied it from the bottom up.

en: Aku tak rasa boleh nampak sebab ada orang duduk di dua meja ini.
vi: I don't think I can see because these two desks will be occupied.
You can't see it from anywhere.

en: kita langsung tak boleh guna Pelan A.
vi: we can't use Plan A at all.

en: Kau kata kita buat sama-sama, Aaidaa!
vi: You said we're in this together, Aaidaa!
Why is everyone staring at me?

en: Aaidaa, aku rasa seluruh tingkatan dah tahu.
vi: Aaidaa, I think the whole batch knows now.
What's up with your game plan?

en: Kenapa Tai Ying dan Zaim pandang aku begitu?
vi: Why were Tai Ying and Zaim staring at me?

en: - Terima kasih. - Nanti, apa yang berlaku?
Itu yang kau nak jadikan kekasih?
Nanti, berapa ramai orang yang tahu?
vi: Wait, how many students know about this?

en: Lebih daripada sepuluh orang tanya aku.
vi: More than 10 people have asked me.
They thought I was in on it.

en: Yang penting, berita tersebar, sekarang semua orang tahu
vi: The point is, word got out, now everybody knows

en: dan mereka mengharapkan sesuatu yang dibatalkan.
vi: and they're counting on something that's canceled.

en: Tiba masanya untuk aku kecewakan semua orang.
vi: Now it's time for me to let the whole batch down.
We were the ones who told the whole batch.
We were really counting on it.

en: Jadi apabila kami dapat tahu kau tak nak buat…
vi: So when we found out that you don't want to do it--
We spread the word to the whole batch.

en: Kami fikir apabila kau dapat tahu
vi: We thought that when you find out

en: seluruh tingkatan bersedia untuk menyokong kau,
vi: that the whole batch is ready to support you,

en: Aku tahu aku menyusahkan kau tahun ini.
vi: I know I've been mean to you this year.

en: Tapi apabila Aizat cakap kau nak tolong kami,
vi: But when Aizat said that you'd help us,

en: tapi sebab kau nak tolong kami.
vi: but because you wanted to help us.

en: Aku tak memahami kau, Tai Ying.
vi: I don't understand you, Tai Ying.
Why were you counting on me?
You're in the Top 10 of our batch.
Why would you want to cheat?

en: Orang macam aku kena dapat keputusan 20A
untuk bersaing dengan 10A daripada pelajar macam kau.
vi: to compete with 10As from students like you.

en: Aaidaa, keluarga aku bukan orang senang.
vi: Aaidaa, my family is not well-off.

en: Kau tak tahu keadaan seluruh tingkatan kita.
vi: You don't know what's going on with our batchmates.
must have your own reason too.

en: Aku tak biasa panggil seluruh tingkatan.
vi: I'm not used to addressing the whole batch, Mi.
That's why I'm not the head prefect.

en: Kau bukan KP sebab kau syaitan.
vi: You're not the head prefect because you're a troublemaker.

en: Percayalah, mereka nak dengar kata-kata kau.
vi: Believe me, they'll want to listen to what you have to say.
Mi, the whole batch respects you.

And also,
 good evening, Tai Ying.

en: Aku tahu kamu sudah tahu pasal…
vi: I know that you now know

en: merancang untuk buat sesuatu bagi semua.
vi: were planning to do something for you guys.

en: aku tak tahu macam mana nak beritahu berita buruk ini.
vi: I don't know how to break the bad news to you.
But I do have to tell you.
I agree to be your Anchor.
There used to be a male student

en: untuk elak daripada ditangkap oleh warden.
vi: to escape being caught by the warden.
Are you afraid of the Locker Ghost?

en: - Hei. - Aku tak minta semua ini!
Pada waktu malam, apabila kita bersendirian di sekolah ini,
vi: At night, when we're alone in this school,

en: Kau dengar lagi bunyi tapak itu?
vi: Can you still hear the footsteps?

en: ♪ Oh, sang mulia dan beban dunia ♪
♪ Oh, sang mulia dan beban dunia ♪
